history.proof: intros. qsimpl time: 1 use: is_lim_inv. qsimpl time: 1 use: ex_lim_comp,is_lim_inv. qsimpl time: 1 use: ex_lim_comp,is_lim_inv,Lim_correct. hfcrush depth: 3use: ex_lim_comp, is_lim_inv, Lim_correct.

exceptions.tactic: apply ex_lim_comp with (fun y => /1) f in Hlim; auto.

exceptions.exn: The reference Hlim was not found in the current environment.

original: intros f x [l Hlim] Hneq0. apply is_lim_inv in Hlim; auto. apply ex_lim_comp with (fun y => /1) f in Hlim; auto. rewrite Lim_correct in Hlim. apply Hlim.
